name: Jetpack (Demo)
description:
After crashing onto a mysterious planet armed with nothing beyond your trusty jetpack and your wits, you must find a way to escape the desolate wasteland, and perhaps learn its secrets along the way...

This is a short tutorial demo showcasing the gameplay & mechanics of the game.

Use the Arrow Keys & Spacebar to move around, fly, and select menu options. You can also use WASD if preferred.

Recover fuel by landing back on the ground. Use different styles of flight to overcome perilous obstacles!

Full source code is available to view on github!
